content: 28 stitches skip 13 and work into next stitch single_crochet to marker r 32 single_crochet to chain 12 single_crochet over chain single_crochet around to next handle 12 single_crochet over chain single_crochet to marker rounds 33 - 36 single_crochet evenly around fasten_off for a nice finishing touch that helps to stabilize the base turn the bag upside down see those free loops remaining from round 7 work one round of slip_stitch into those loops to help your bag keep its shape fasten_off and weave in all your ends happy gift giving
